Rename Column.WHAT: To rename a column in a DataFrame to a new specified name.
Rename Column.WHY: Improves dataset clarity by renaming verbose, typo-ridden, or inconsistent columns, enhancing readability for users.
Rename Column.EXAMPLE: Intial column name 'Name', changed column name 'Full Name'

Drop Column.WHAT: To remove one or more specified columns from a DataFrame.
Drop Column.WHY: Essential for removing non-contributory columns from large datasets, simplifying the model and potentially improving performance by addressing the curse of dimensionality.
Drop Column.EXAMPLE: Column specified in the DataFrame titled 'Calories' can be removed from the DataFrame
